title: Responsive Product Grid
description: Build a product grid that adapts its column count based on available width.
instructions: Create a ProductGrid widget that displays product cards in a grid. Use LayoutBuilder to calculate the number of columns: 1 column for width < 400px, 2 columns for width < 700px, 3 columns for width < 1000px, and 4 columns for larger widths. Each product card should show an image placeholder, title, and price. The grid should have 16px spacing between items.

hints.text: Use SliverGridDelegateWithFixedCrossAxisCount with the calculated column count
Set childAspectRatio to control the height-to-width ratio of grid items

commonMistakes.consequence: Grid doesn't respond to its container size, only screen size
commonMistakes.correction: Use LayoutBuilder to get the actual available width for the grid

commonMistakes.consequence: Items touch the edges of the container
commonMistakes.correction: Add padding: const EdgeInsets.all(16) to GridView.builder
